reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 106/20: ORDER MADE UNDER THE ACT - EXTENSIONS AND RENEWALS OF ORDERS
reg_info.reg_name_text: ORDER MADE UNDER THE ACT - EXTENSIONS AND RENEWALS OF ORDERS
reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content:
1. An Order referred to in Column 1 of the following Table is extended under section 7.0.8 of the Act past its previously applicable revocation date, as set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the Order, and is revoked on the date set out opposite the Order in Column 3, subject to any further extension under that section. TABLE  Item   Column 1   Order in Council and date made   Column 2   Previously applicable revocation date   Column 3   Current revocation date 

  1.   Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 52/20 (Order Under Subsection 7.0.2 (4) of the Act - Organized Public Events, Certain Gatherings), made March 17, 2020   July 22, 2020   July 17, 2020

content.content: 2. The extension, made by O. Reg. 416/20, of the following Orders is shortened such that each of the Orders is revoked at the last instant of July 23, 2020: 1. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 89/20 (Traffic Management). 2. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 128/20 (Pick Up and Delivery of Cannabis). 3. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 140/20 (Agreements Between Health Service Providers and Retirement Homes). O. Reg. 106/20, Sched. 1, s. 1; O. Reg. 138/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 143/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 165/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 199/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 220/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 226/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 244/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 247/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 257/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 264/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 281/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 323/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 359/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 416/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 423/20, s. 1, 2. schedule 2   renewals of orders made under subsection 7.1 (2) of the act
content.raw_html:
2. The extension, made by O. Reg. 416/20, of the following Orders is shortened such that each of the Orders is revoked at the last instant of July 23, 2020:

1. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 89/20 (Traffic Management).

2. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 128/20 (Pick Up and Delivery of Cannabis).

3. Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 140/20 (Agreements Between Health Service Providers and Retirement Homes).

O. Reg. 106/20, Sched. 1, s. 1; O. Reg. 138/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 143/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 165/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 199/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 220/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 226/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 244/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 247/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 257/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 264/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 281/20, s. 1, 2; O. Reg. 323/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 359/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 416/20, s. 1; O. Reg. 423/20, s. 1, 2.

schedule 2
renewals of orders made under subsection 7.1 (2) of the act

content.content:
1. An Order referred to in Column 1 of the following Table, under which a temporary suspension period took effect on the date set out opposite in Column 2, is renewed under section 7.1 of the Act for the period of time set out opposite in Column 3 such that the last day of the temporary suspension period is the date set out opposite in Column 4, subject to any further renewal under that section. TABLE  Item   Column 1   Order in Council and date made   Column 2   Date on which temporary suspension took effect   Column 3   Period of renewal   Column 4   Last day of suspension period, as renewed 

  1.   Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 73/20 (Limitation Periods), made March 20, 2020   March 16, 2020   90 days   September 11, 2020 

  2.   Order in Council filed as O. Reg. 195/20 (Treatment of Temporary COVID-19 Related Payments to Employees), made May 1, 2020   April 24, 2020   22 days   August 13, 2020 O. Reg. 259/20, s. 2; O. Reg. 417/20, s. 1.  Français

1. An Order referred to in Column 1 of the following Table, under which a temporary suspension period took effect on the date set out opposite in Column 2, is renewed under section 7.1 of the Act for the period of time set out opposite in Column 3 such that the last day of the temporary suspension period is the date set out opposite in Column 4, subject to any further renewal under that section.

TABLE

Column 2
